subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Despite Rafael Nadal’s wish for fewer hardcourt tournaments, clay courts present particular challenges, like a slower game, balls that bounce high and dirt from the courts blowing into players’ eyes.
snippet: Despite Rafael Nadal’s wish for fewer hardcourt tournaments, clay courts present particular challenges, like a slower game, balls that bounce high and dirt from the courts blowing into players’ eyes.
